mapper.select:
select count(1) from product_info pi -- left join product_type pt on pi.product_type_id = pt.id
1 = 1
and pi.product_type_codes like concat('%', #{vo.productTypeCode}, '%')
and (pi.cn_name like concat('%', #{vo.productTitle}, '%') or pi.en_name like concat('%', #{vo.productTitle}, '%'))

select pi.*, pp.id pp_id, pp.product_info_id pp_product_info_id, pp.image_name pp_image_name, pp.image_url pp_image_url, pp.create_at pp_create_at, pp.update_at pp_update_at from product_info pi -- left join product_type pt on pi.product_type_id = pt.id left join product_pic pp on pp.product_info_id = pi.id
1 = 1
and pi.product_type_codes like concat('%', #{vo.productTypeCode}, '%')
and (pi.cn_name like concat('%', #{vo.productTitle}, '%') or pi.en_name like concat('%', #{vo.productTitle}, '%'))
order by pi.update_at desc

select pi.*, pp.id pp_id, pp.product_info_id pp_product_info_id, pp.image_name pp_image_name, pp.image_url pp_image_url, pp.create_at pp_create_at, pp.update_at pp_update_at from product_info pi -- left join product_type pt on pi.product_type_id = pt.id left join product_pic pp on pp.product_info_id = pi.id
pi.id = #{productId}

select pi.id productId, pi.en_name title, pp.image_url imageUrl from product_info pi left join product_pic pp on pp.product_info_id = pi.id
pi.id != #{excludeId} and pi.application like concat('%', #{application}, '%')
limit 3
